description: Vue Bits component - Text with blur-in animation using Intersection Observer and motion-v

animateBy.description: Determines whether to animate by 'words' or 'letters'

direction.description: Direction from which the words/letters appear ('top' or 'bottom')

delay.description: Delay between animations for each word/letter (in ms)

stepDuration.description: The time taken for each letter/word to animate (in seconds)

threshold.description: Intersection threshold for triggering the animation (0-1)

rootMargin.description: Root margin for the intersection observer

className.description: Additional class names to style the component

class.description: Alias for className - CSS class names

easing.description: Custom easing function for the animation
